title: SQL Portfolio & Analytics Practice
short_summary: Mixed SQL portfolio combining query challenges, business analytics, and data engineering use cases
summary: A comprehensive SQL portfolio combining algorithmic SQL challenges with applied business analytics and database engineering work. Includes performance-optimized queries, exploratory analysis, dimensional modeling, and ETL workflows designed to demonstrate proficiency in relational systems and decision-focused analytics.

components.name: LeetCode SQL Challenges
components.objective: Develop advanced SQL problem-solving ability through structured challenges emphasizing correctness, efficiency, and edge-case handling.
components.business_value: Demonstrates readiness for technical screening and production analytics by consistently delivering optimized, accurate SQL solutions.

components.name: Iowa Liquor Sales Analysis
components.objective: Analyze category growth, regional demand, and margin trends using large-scale retail sales data in BigQuery.
components.business_value: Supports data-driven merchandising and marketing strategies by identifying high-growth categories and profitable regions.

components.name: Google Trends Search Analytics
components.objective: Examine large-scale search behavior patterns to identify emerging topics and declining demand signals.
components.business_value: Improves marketing efficiency by informing campaign planning and budget allocation using search trend intelligence.

components.name: NBA Statistics Database & Analytics Layer
components.objective: Design and implement a relational database and ETL pipeline to support scalable NBA performance analytics.
components.business_value: Enables high-performance querying and real-time analytics by organizing large sports datasets into optimized star schemas.
